thread.section_title: Zodee Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zodee | zodee.com.au
thread.title: VALERIE PITTY

author: VALERIE PITTY
title: VALERIE PITTY
text:
I bought a Playtex Cross Your Heart bra recently. I was informed regularly of the success of the purchase and the expected time of delivery. All went to plan and I was very satisfied.
However, I now receive daily ads fro Zodee fr various types of lingerie. As I am quite advanced in years, it is unlikely I will need another item in the near future Certainly not glamorous one. So please stop sending me ads.
